div.bibl: Narod Polski, Vol. XI, No. 13, March 27, 1907. POLISH BANK

body.p: The administration of the city of Chicago has confidence in the Polish bank, the Northwestern Trust and Savings Bank. It has chosen this bank for the depository for city funds.
The city comptroller and financial committee decided to deal with us in preference to other bank's.
The bank has proved to us Poles to be honest and deserving, clean and accurate in the transaction of all banking business.
